summary: This is an email chain from June 1, 2020, regarding the coordination of bank subpoena returns for the Epstein case. An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York requests assistance in delivering copies of FirstBank Puerto Rico records to a case agent, referencing the 2018 SDNY investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the initial email requesting assistance in getting copies of recent bank subpoena returns (FirstBank Puerto Rico) to the case agent for the Epstein case.

connections.person1: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: The AUSA is requesting M's assistance in coordinating the delivery of bank subpoena returns for the Epstein case.

events.title: Coordination for Bank Records Delivery
events.description: Email correspondence regarding arranging delivery of FirstBank Puerto Rico subpoena returns to the case agent for the Epstein investigation.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated June 1, 2020, concerning the Epstein case investigation.
It references bank subpoena returns from FirstBank Puerto Rico related to the 2018 SDNY investigation of Epstein.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests assistance in delivering these records to the case agent, to be left at 1 Saint Andrews Plaza.
The records are stored on a DOJ network path: W.Usa.doj.gov\clouaNYS\StAndrews\SharecALISvEpstein-2018R01618\InvestigationW 2018 SDNY investigation\Subpoena Returns\FirstBank Puerto Rico.
